Type Property# automatic

StoreKitSwiftUIiOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
static var automatic: AutomaticProductViewStyle { get }
```

Available when `Self` is `AutomaticProductViewStyle`.## [See Also](/documentation/StoreKit/ProductViewStyle/automatic#see-also)

### [Getting built-in product view styles](/documentation/StoreKit/ProductViewStyle/automatic#Getting-built-in-product-view-styles)

[`static var compact: CompactProductViewStyle`](/documentation/storekit/productviewstyle/compact)An product view style suitable for layouts where less space is available, or for displaying more items in a small amount of space.[`static var large: LargeProductViewStyle`](/documentation/storekit/productviewstyle/large)A product view style suitable for layouts where the in-app purchase content is prominent.[`static var regular: RegularProductViewStyle`](/documentation/storekit/productviewstyle/regular)A product view style that uses a standard, platform-appropriate layout.
